mapper.insert: INSERT INTO messages (user_id, user_type, answer_id, question_id, content, is_read, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userType}, #{answerId}, #{questionId}, #{content}, #{isRead}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM messages WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND user_type = #{userType} AND is_read = 0 ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM messages WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND user_type = #{userType} AND is_read = 0
SELECT * FROM messages WHERE answer_id = #{answerId} LIMIT 1
